ModMetaData.name: Pawn Badge - XCOM Ranks
ModMetaData.author: Lurmey
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the rank and class icons from XCOM 2 to Pawn Badge by RangelReale (Updated by Saucy_Pigeon)
Includes Psi Operatives for Royalty DLC.
Recommended mods: Dubs Rimkit (Medic Specialist) What The Hack?! (Combat Specialist) Weapon Tech or Vanilla Weapons Expanded XCOM Weapons and/or Rimlaser Pawn Badge - XCOM Badge for more similar badges inspired by these! XCOM 2 - Music
Fully Multiplayer Compatible! (Provided Pawn Badge is, of course! :P)
